category: International Ice Cream for Breakfast Day

rounds.pro_tip: Examine text and labels ‚Äî AI struggles with readable, consistent lettering.
rounds._note: Prompt: A photorealistic photograph of a towering stack of fluffy blueberry pancakes, garnished with a slowly melting scoop of lemon sorbet and a rich cascade of berry compote, placed on a dark wooden table. Shot with a Sony a7 III, 100mm f/2.8 macro lens, warm indoor lighting with soft shadows, low-angle medium shot focusing on the stack.

rounds.attribution: Photo by Austin Distel on Unsplash
rounds.pro_tip: Natural imperfections like lens flare, slight blur, or uneven lighting are hallmarks of a real photograph.
Look at reflections ‚Äî real reflections match the environment, AI reflections are often random.
rounds._note: Prompt: A photorealistic photograph of a young man, partially obscured, wearing a light blue knitted sweater, sitting on a wooden stool at a rustic kitchen island, casually stirring a bowl of granola with a scoop of pistachio ice cream. Shot with a Fujifilm X-T4, 35mm f/2 lens, golden hour morning light streaming through a window, slightly wide and candid composition.

rounds.pro_tip: Check for symmetry ‚Äî AI tends to make things too perfect and symmetrical.
rounds._note: Prompt: A photorealistic photograph of a carefully arranged breakfast tray on a crisp white duvet, featuring a bowl of overnight oats topped with a scoop of coffee ice cream and sliced bananas, alongside a glass of freshly squeezed orange juice. Shot with an iPhone 14 Pro in portrait mode, wide-angle overhead flat lay, even bright ambient light.

rounds.attribution: Photo by Austin P on Unsplash
rounds.pro_tip: Natural imperfections like lens flare, slight blur, or uneven lighting are hallmarks of a real photograph.

rounds.attribution: Photo by Amin Zabardast on Unsplash
rounds.pro_tip: Natural imperfections like lens flare, slight blur, or uneven lighting are hallmarks of a real photograph.
Look for natural imperfections ‚Äî real photos have dust, slight blur, and uneven lighting.
rounds._note: Prompt: A photorealistic photograph of a single slice of slightly toasted multigrain bread on a white ceramic plate, topped with a melting scoop of vanilla bean ice cream and a light drizzle of honey. Shot with a Canon EOS R5, 50mm f/1.8 lens, natural soft morning light from a window, shallow depth of field.

rounds.pro_tip: Check edges carefully ‚Äî AI often produces halos or unnatural blending where objects meet.
rounds._note: Prompt: A photorealistic photograph of a golden-brown Belgian waffle, artfully folded, with a scoop of strawberry swirl ice cream nestled in its center, generously drizzled with dark chocolate sauce and a sprinkle of powdered sugar. Shot with a Nikon Z7, 85mm f/1.4 lens, bright diffused studio light, medium eye-level shot.
